globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://accounts.google.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com https://accounts.google.com; img-src 'self' data: https://intexmovieposters.blob.core.windows.net https://*.blob.core.windows.net; frame-ancestors 'none'; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com data:; connect-src 'self' https://localhost:5001 https://intex-bougier.azurewebsites.net https://intex-2025.azurewebsites.net https://accounts.google.com https://oauth2.googleapis.com; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-src 'self' https://accounts.google.com https://oauth2.googleapis.com;
